name: nativescript-gif
description: NativeScript plugin to render GIF images (forked and patched)

scripts.ci.base.setup: npm i -g typescript && echo no | npm i -g nativescript && tns usage-reporting disable && tns error-reporting disable && cd src && npm i && tsc
scripts.ci.pip.install: sudo pip install --upgrade pip && sudo pip install six
scripts.ci.tslint: cd src && npm run ci.tslint && cd ../demo && npm run ci.tslint

author: Brad Martin
